definition: variant of 長筒靴|长筒靴[chang2 tong3 xue1]

sentences.english: And he advanced on the tips of his boots towards the corner which Marius had turned.
sentences.chinese: 他踮起長統靴的腳尖朝着馬呂斯拐彎的那個牆角走去。

sentences.english: High brown boots with laces dangling.
sentences.chinese: 棕色長統靴，飾帶晃來晃去。

sentences.english: My boots are plastered with mud.
sentences.chinese: 我的長統靴上粘滿了泥巴。

sentences.english: She feels uncomfortable in tight boots.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着緊的長統靴感到不舒適。

sentences.english: I mean, one girl showed up wearing a fur miniskirt and high-heeled boots.
sentences.chinese: 我是說，有個女孩穿毛皮迷你裙和高跟長統靴來上班。

sentences.english: But John took off his boots and dived into the river.
sentences.chinese: 但約翰脫下長統靴跳入河流。
